label: cascading_failure_01_ep_027
content:
## 2024-02-10 Daily Operations Summary

- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 158800 | p50: 200ms p95: 540ms p99: 920ms | err: 1.13% (1800 errors) | success: 98.87%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 154900 | p50: 390ms p95: 750ms p99: 880ms | err: 0.53% (820 errors) | success: 99.47%
- /auth: REQUESTS 207100 | p50: 53ms p95: 136ms p99: 258ms | err: 0.2% (420 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 279200 | p50: 70ms p95: 208ms p99: 390ms | err: 0.19% (520 errors) | success: 99.81%
- /search: REQUESTS 244800 | p50: 94ms p95: 260ms p99: 475ms | err: 0.3% (740 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 197500 | p50: 122ms p95: 350ms p99: 620ms | err: 0.37% (740 errors) | success: 99.63%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 78% | Mem 84% | Disk 63% | Conns: 7800 | Net: 760/925 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 75% | Mem 82% | Disk 62% | Conns: 7605 | Net: 742/900 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 84% | Mem 86% | Disk 62% | Conns: 8600 | Net: 860/1010 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 54% | Mem 84% | Disk 89% | Conns: 495 | Net: 205/252 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 238 | idle 22 | waiting 410 | exhaustion: 48 | max: 260 | avg_wait: 290ms
- replica: active 98 | idle 2 | waiting 95 | exhaustion: 16 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 88ms
- third_party_geo: active 115 | idle 5 | waiting 220 | exhaustion: 40 | max: 120 | avg_wait: 310ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 91.4% | Bandwidth: 10.0 Gbps | Origin requests: 528400

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-01: pool=third_party_geo events=40 waiting=220
- [CRITICAL] CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE on gateway-01: error_pct=3.83

### Deployments & Changes
- Deployed service-B (fraud) v2.7.7 (geo cache)

### Events
- Service-B deploy completed
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Feature flag 'skip-geo-on-timeout' set to 70% of traffic
- Updated gateway retry policy for upstream geo to 0 retries

### On-Call
- Shift: D. Kim. 17 pages. 6 tickets (SRV-B-312 deploy, CO-913, POOL-674, GW-438, FF-116, VEND-138). Status: Mitigating.
